alert.note: Alert for South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 8:36AM MST until January 30 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Rocky Mountain National Park and the Medicine Bow Range. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet
